meanings.definition: Having a pointed or projecting shape.
meanings.sent1: The cusped roof of the house made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had a cusped peak that could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The cusped edges of the cake gave it a unique appearance at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her cusped nails resembled tiny daggers ready to strike.
meanings.sent5: The cusped arches of the bridge created a stunning silhouette against the sunset.

meanings.sent1: The cusped teeth of the comb helped detangle her hair easily.
meanings.sent2: The cusped edges of the leaves made them look like delicate fans.
meanings.sent3: The cusped design on the fabric added a touch of elegance to the dress.
meanings.sent4: His cusped ears could pick up even the faintest sounds in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The cusped petals of the flower gave it a unique and intricate appearance.

meanings.sent1: The cusped design on the window glass created beautiful patterns of light.
meanings.sent2: The cusped edges of the mirror reflected light in interesting ways.
meanings.sent3: The cusped patterns on the rug added a touch of sophistication to the room.
meanings.sent4: The cusped decorations on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The cusped edges of the building's architecture added a modern touch to the city skyline.
